interesting...\""},{"lineNumber":13581,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":13582,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　バシッ……！","translatedEnglishLine":"*Smack...!*"},{"lineNumber":13583,"originalJapaneseLine":"「………………ん」","translatedEnglishLine":"\".........Hm.\""},{"lineNumber":13584,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスの耳に届いたのは、","translatedEnglishLine":"The sound that reached Lance's ears was,"},{"lineNumber":13585,"originalJapaneseLine":"紙束を叩きつけるような音だった。","translatedEnglishLine":"the noise of papers being slammed down in a stack."},{"lineNumber":13586,"originalJapaneseLine":"「中庭の方……か？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"From the courtyard... maybe?\""},{"lineNumber":13587,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……………………」","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":13588,"originalJapaneseLine":"「や……やめて、ください……！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"P-please, stop...!"},{"lineNumber":13589,"originalJapaneseLine":"　こういうの……め、迷惑ですっ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"These kinds of things... a-are annoying!\""},{"lineNumber":13590,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………ごめんね」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...I'm sorry.\""},{"lineNumber":13591,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そんな……そんな言葉、要りませんっ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I don't need... words like that!\""},{"lineNumber":13592,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あの……あの、人は……もう、っ……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"That... that person... is already...!"},{"lineNumber":13593,"originalJapaneseLine":"女性は目に溜めた涙を見せないようにして、","translatedEnglishLine":"The woman tried not to show the tears welling up in her eyes,"},{"lineNumber":13594,"originalJapaneseLine":"走り去った。","translatedEnglishLine":"and ran away."},{"lineNumber":13595,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………あーあ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Ahhh.\""},{"lineNumber":13596,"originalJapaneseLine":"表情を消して、パパイアは足元に散乱した紙束を","translatedEnglishLine":"With a blank expression, Papaya started gathering the scattered papers at her feet."},{"lineNumber":13597,"originalJapaneseLine":"拾い集めはじめた。","translatedEnglishLine":"She began picking them up."},{"lineNumber":13598,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんだ。修羅場か？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What's this? A scene of carnage?\""},{"lineNumber":13599,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あらランス。ま、そんなとこよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh, Lance. Yeah, something like that.\""},{"lineNumber":13600,"originalJapaneseLine":"「女の子とする時は俺も呼べと言ってるだろ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I told you to call me when you're with a girl."},{"lineNumber":13601,"originalJapaneseLine":"　なんだこの紙束…………んん？　現金書留？」","translatedEnglishLine":"What's with this stack of papers... hmm? A cash registered mail?\""},{"lineNumber":13602,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あっ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah...\""},{"lineNumber":13603,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスが拾った紙を、パパイアがひょいと取り返す。","translatedEnglishLine":"Papaya casually snatched the paper Lance picked up back from him."},{"lineNumber":13604,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……金送ってたのか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...You were sending money?\""},{"lineNumber":13605,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………あー。ミスった。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Ah. That was a mistake."},{"lineNumber":13606,"originalJapaneseLine":"　けっこう参ってんのかな、あたし……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Maybe I'm really feeling down...\""},{"lineNumber":13607,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんか……重い話か？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Is this... some heavy story?\""},{"lineNumber":13608,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まあ、それなりに？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well, somewhat?\""},{"lineNumber":13609,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……………………」","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":13610,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスが去る気配を見せないことで、","translatedEnglishLine":"Seeing that Lance didn't show any sign of leaving,"},{"lineNumber":13611,"originalJapaneseLine":"パパイアは観念した。","translatedEnglishLine":"Papaya resigned herself."},{"lineNumber":13612,"originalJapaneseLine":"ため息をひとつ。","translatedEnglishLine":"She let out a single sigh."},{"lineNumber":13613,"originalJapaneseLine":"「昔、さ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Long ago,"},{"lineNumber":13614,"originalJapaneseLine":"けっこう色々やらかしたでしょ、あたし。","translatedEnglishLine":"I caused quite a lot of trouble, you know."},{"lineNumber":13615,"originalJapaneseLine":"その、実験体の……恋人だったって」","translatedEnglishLine":"That was the lover of the test subject.\""},{"lineNumber":13616,"originalJapaneseLine":"「う…………って、ことはそいつは……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Uh... so that means he...\""},{"lineNumber":13617,"originalJapaneseLine":"「もちろん死んでる」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Of course he's dead.\""},{"lineNumber":13618,"originalJapaneseLine":"「首から下をダイコンと合成させて、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"They grafted his body from the neck down onto a radish,"},{"lineNumber":13619,"originalJapaneseLine":"実験に使った後……生きたまま漬け物にして、","translatedEnglishLine":"used him for experiments... then pickled him alive,"},{"lineNumber":13620,"originalJapaneseLine":"ノミコンと一緒にワインのツマミにしたわ。確か","translatedEnglishLine":"and had him as a snack with Nomicon and wine. I’m pretty sure.\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「トリオ・ザ・棒姉妹」
「止めろッて言ってんでしょーーーーーっ！！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I told you to stopーーーーー!!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、あはは……」
パパイア達はかしましく、
わずかな休日を騒ぎ続けた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: kept making a ruckus during their brief holiday.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はー、遊んだ遊んだ。ふわあぁ……
んー、ではさらば」
にゃんにゃんのような自由さで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With the carefree freedom of a kitty-cat,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: パパイアは去っていった。
「…………気を遣わせてしまいましたね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...I have made you worry, haven’t I?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「…そうね。
私たちに、リフレッシュさせようと……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Trying to let us refresh ourselves...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 分かんない様な気の回し方ばっかりするんだから」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You always do things in a way we can't really understand."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「勝って……報いましょう」
「ええ。また集まるためにも、ね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes. So that we can gather again as well."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼス首脳の二人は頷いて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The two leaders of Zeth nodded,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 互いの戦場へと戻っていった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and returned to their respective battlefields.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼスを訪れたランスは、
暇を持て余してあちこちうろついていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was wandering here and there, bored out of his mind.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さーて……何か面白い事でも……」
バシッ……！
ランスの耳に届いたのは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The sound that reached Lance's ears was,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 紙束を叩きつけるような音だった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the noise of papers being slammed down in a stack.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「中庭の方……か？」
「や……やめて、ください……！
こういうの……め、迷惑ですっ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: These kinds of things... a-are annoying!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「…………ごめんね」
「そんな……そんな言葉、要りませんっ！
あの……あの、人は……もう、っ……！」
女性は目に溜めた涙を見せないようにして、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The woman tried not to show the tears welling up in her eyes,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 走り去った。
表情を消して、パパイアは足元に散乱した紙束を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With a blank expression, Papaya started gathering the scattered papers at her feet.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 拾い集めはじめた。
「なんだ。修羅場か？」
「あらランス。ま、そんなとこよ」
「女の子とする時は俺も呼べと言ってるだろ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I told you to call me when you're with a girl.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんだこの紙束…………んん？　現金書留？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What's with this stack of papers... hmm? A cash registered mail?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが拾った紙を、パパイアがひょいと取り返す。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Papaya casually snatched the paper Lance picked up back from him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……金送ってたのか？」
「…………あー。ミスった。
けっこう参ってんのかな、あたし……」
「なんか……重い話か？」
「まあ、それなりに？」
ランスが去る気配を見せないことで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Seeing that Lance didn't show any sign of leaving,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: パパイアは観念した。
ため息をひとつ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She let out a single sigh.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「昔、さ」
けっこう色々やらかしたでしょ、あたし。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I caused quite a lot of trouble, you know.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その、実験体の……恋人だったって」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That was the lover of the test subject."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「う…………って、ことはそいつは……」
「もちろん死んでる」
「首から下をダイコンと合成させて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "They grafted his body from the neck down onto a radish,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 実験に使った後……生きたまま漬け物にして、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: used him for experiments... then pickled him alive,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ノミコンと一緒にワインのツマミにしたわ。確か
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and had him as a snack with Nomicon and wine. I’m pretty sure."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
